reviews.text: Great location and great vibes. Came here from untapped as it should be a "Verified" place. Great beer selection and lovely chill vibes. Out of the way from the city, but still walking distance. Definitely worth the detour.

We arrived at the hotel on Thursday 22nd August. The hotel is very well located has nice rooms with a nice kitchen and terrace. However we had read in the comments that there were bed bugs. As a precaution we emailed the hotel to find out if they had taken the necessary steps to disinfect/treat the bedbugs. The hotel confirmed that they had. We left the hotel and one of our group ended up being eaten by bedbug bites... We don't want to denigrate the hotel  but I don't think they really took the necessary steps to treat these bedbugs. Make sure you check everything when you stay there!

Literally the funnest hostel I’ve ever been to. Well placed, people are very kind and respectful. It’s possible to rest but you’ll also always find someone who’s down to hang out. Rooms and kitchen are nice, it’s very clean and the workers are helpful. I would love to return.

The worst food and service I've ever had. The manager has no grasp on how to treat customers.   Horrible experience!!!!!  I hope they fail soon.  And they will with that type of service. Do not go there!!

The pub has a nice atmosphere. The hostel itself never had staff present to answer questions. You had to go to the pub and ask the staff member who was already busy in the pub for help. The hostel was small and cozy. Can meet other travelers, but no events or anything like that. Decent stay for a couple nights.
